naslov: Podstrana, LUX VILLA S PANORAMSKIM POGLEDOM -top lokacija -čitaj opis (prodaja)
opis: - ekskluzivna nekretnina agencije #adriaINgroup - kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju 3% od prodajne cijene Cijenjeni klijenti, razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane za kupoprodaju, a sve sukladno Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. Atraktivna samostojeća vila (novogradnja) u Podstrani/Strožancu, udaljena svega tristotinjak metara do plaže s panoramskim pogledom na more, otoke, Split i Stobreč. Vila je projektirana i uredjena od strane etabliranog arhitekta, sa brandiranom opremom i namještajem. TEHNIČKI OPIS: - stambeno 370m2 - okućnica brutto 510m2 .............................................................. + SUTEREN: konoba, teretana, studio apartman, ured, garaža za dva automobila + PRIZEMLJE: dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i blagovaonom, soba ili igraona za djecu, kupatilo i terasa + KAT: četiri spavaće sobe sa četiri kupatila, garderoba, hodnik i balkon + KROVNA TERASA (nenatkrivena terasa 82,16m2, natkrivena terasa 35,11m2): natkrivena ljetna kuhinja, lounge, jacuzzi, sauna... .............................................................. - NAPOMENA: detaljne slike, tlocrte, video i ostalo šaljemo isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// - exclusive real estate agency #adriaINgroup - the buyer pays an agency commission of 3% of the selling price Dear clients, the tour of the real estate is possible only with a signed brokerage agreement which is the basis for further actions related to the sale, all in accordance with the Real Estate Brokerage Act. Attractive detached villa (new building) in Podstrana / Strožanac, only three hundred meters from the beach with panoramic views of the sea, islands, Split and Stobreč. The villa was designed and decorated by an established architect, with branded equipment and furniture. TECHNICAL DESCRIPTION: - residential 370m2 - garden gross 510m2 .................................................. ............ + BASEMENT: tavern, gym, studio apartment, office, garage for two cars + GROUND FLOOR: living room with kitchen and dining area, room or playroom for children, bathroom and terrace + FLOOR: four bedrooms with four bathrooms, wardrobe, hallway and balcony + ROOF TERRACE (uncovered terrace 82,16m2, covered terrace 35,11m2): covered summer kitchen, lounge, jacuzzi, sauna ... .................................................. ............ - NOTE: detailed pictures, floor plans, videos and more are sent exclusively with a signed brokerage agreement #adriaINgroup realestate-consulting-design-development-VIP service ...............................................................
